data.title: Ray Cost and Procedure Comparison
data.meta_description: If you need to know the direct cost of an Ankle X-Ray procedure (which can vary by geographic area), we can show you exact costs facilities charge. Use our procedure cost comparisons to save money on your procedure!
data.text:
An X-Ray Procedure is used to study and diagnose disease of the skeletal system as well as for detecting some disease processes in soft tissue. X-rays use invisible electromagnetic energy beams to produce images of internal tissues, bones, and organs on film. X-rays are made by using external radiation to produce images of the body, its organs and other internal structures for diagnostic purposes. X-rays pass through body tissues onto specially treated plates (similar to camera film) and a “negative” type picture is made (the more solid a structure is, the whiter it appears on the film).

National Ankle X-Ray Procedure Pricing Summary

National Minimum Price $51 (Lincolnton, NC) National Average Price $72 National Maximum Price $133 (Lincolnton, NC)

Ankle X-Ray Cost Averages Around the Country

Price Range San Francisco, CA Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $110 - $280 Seattle, WA Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $70 - $170 Denver, CO Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $60 - $150 St. Louis, MO Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $80 - $190 Tampa, FL Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $60 - $140 San Diego, CA Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $80 - $200 Boston, MA Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $100 - $240 Detroit, MI Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $60 - $160 Minneapolis, MN Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $60 - $150 Baltimore, MD Ankle X-Ray Cost Average $90 - $230

Click to find out more about how to use the pricing information shown on this site.

How to Use Our Pricing Data

Our goal at NewChoiceHealth is to provide you with comprehensive medical pricing information that gives you the power to make more informed healthcare purchasing decisions. Because medical procedure pricing varies by procedure type, insurance type, and numerous other factors, price ranges must be used to best represent facility level pricing. Pricing shown is either provided by the facilities (If you are a facility, please contact us if you would like to update your profile) or commercial plans and fee schedules, and should be used only as a benchmark to compare pricing at medical facilities.
